title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view in the Edit (or some other global) menu. Currently, we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis. This should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu.
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be available in the context menu or in the Edit (or some other global) menu to make it easily accessible to users.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Select text in the editor. 
2. Open the context menu and check if the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is available. 
3. Switch to the Outline view and check if the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is available.
